title: champion mastery let down
body:
Hi im just a simple guy from the backwater little place called australia in the oce region i was just wondering why is champion mastery tokens to advance to mastery level 6 & 7 only given on S ranked games on summpners rift or twisted treeline yet progression points to get to level 5 is given out it aram as well that to me sounds contradictory so you get really good with a champ on aram and rewarded for it to a point then its screw you if you want more tough luck. I only just found out that unless I play ziggs {{champion:115}}  on another map of which i dont like either of them i am never going to advance past a mastery level 5 ranking. So my question is why cant we also advance like anyone else is it something that is going to be changed or am i doomed to stay as a low level 5th for the rest of my days ?

And here is a poll for my fellow players is there a champ that you have gotten really good with but have been let down in a similar way to me by these contradictory terms that have been placed on things like champ mastery or grading for games played at all ?

replies.body:
Mastery level doesn't mean everything, i'd be more scared of a 430k mastery level 5 yasuo than i would be of a 60k mastery level 7 yasuo.
Its not given out on aram because the matchups guarantee your win more often than your skill does, so it'd be silly giving out mastery tokens on an RNG map.
i can understand that but you also get special interactions with your character for being that mastery level as well which is what i want but cant because of this

Please feel free to let me know how so in the comments or any thoughts you also have on this issue thanks again.
